description: Borrowed from Latin cīvicus (“pertaining to a city or citizens”). Doublet of civil.

adjectives.description: civic (comparative more civic, superlative most civic)

entries.meaning: Of, relating to, or belonging to a city, a citizen, or citizenship; municipal or civil.
examples: Thousands of people came to the Civic Center to show off their civic pride.

entries.meaning: Of or relating to the citizen, or of good citizenship and its rights and duties.
